entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
